entry.title: Smoke Testing With Cucumber On Sysadvent
entry.content: I wrote a quick article last week for the excellent "sysadvent":http://sysadvent.blogspot.com advent calendar, "Smoke Testing Deployments with Cucumber":http://sysadvent.blogspot.com/2010/12/day-17-smoke-testing-deployments-using.html talks a bit more about using a few of my favourite tools to check whether a deployment just broke anything important.
